meanings.definition: A post at the back of a fireplace to support the chimney.
meanings.sent1: The heelpost in the fireplace was sturdy.
meanings.sent2: The chimney wouldn't stand without the heelpost.
meanings.sent3: The heelpost in the fireplace seemed to be holding up the sky!
meanings.sent4: The heelpost stood tall like a guardian of the chimney.
meanings.sent5: The heelpost's role in the fireplace was crucial for safety.

meanings.definition: A post at the back of a vehicle's cab to support the roof.
meanings.sent1: The heelpost in the truck was made of strong metal.
meanings.sent2: The roof of the car was supported by the heelpost.
meanings.sent3: The heelpost in the truck looked like a tiny superhero holding up the roof.
meanings.sent4: The heelpost was the backbone of the vehicle's cab.
meanings.sent5: The heelpost's job was to keep the roof from falling down.

meanings.definition: A post at the back of a staircase to support the handrail.
meanings.sent1: The heelpost on the staircase was painted white.
meanings.sent2: Hold onto the handrail attached to the heelpost.
meanings.sent3: The heelpost on the stairs felt like a friendly guide.
meanings.sent4: The heelpost was like a loyal friend supporting the handrail.
meanings.sent5: The heelpost's presence made climbing the stairs safer.
